channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After rocky start, Bari Weiss to cut staff, add commentators at CBS News

item.title: How the Trump Administration Hobbled Federal Labor Unions
item.description: With 300,000 employees gone and collective-bargaining rights eliminated, the administration has hobbled organized labor. Did it also start a movement?

item.title: Trump Vows Higher Tariffs for South Korea Months After Trade Deal
item.description: President Trump said Seoul was not moving fast enough to implement the agreement, which calls for South Korea to invest billions in the United States.

item.title: Record Debt in the World’s Richest Nations Threatens Global Growth
item.description: The cost of borrowing is already choking crucial public spending in many developing economies. Now it’s raising broader alarms.

item.title: Trinidadian Families File Wrongful Death Lawsuit Over Boat Strike by U.S. Military
